name: Spending Spree
description: "Spending Spree" is a thrilling challenge where players race against the clock to spend one million dollars on luxury items such as jewelry and televisions. With just two minutes on the clock, players must make quick and savvy spending decisions to rack up the highest score possible. Browse through an array of high-end products and choose wisely, as each purchase brings you one step closer to the finish line. Will you come out on top as the ultimate Spending Spree champion? Find out now!
